articles.title: Progresso Soup Drops, Explained—Has Convenience Culture Reached Its Peak?
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Progresso launched Progresso Soup Drops, a new candy inspired by Progresso Chicken Noodle Soup. The product is available for a limited time at progressoSoupDrops.com.

articles.title: Shark Tank's Daymond John: Why You Don't Need Money to Build a Billion-Dollar Business
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: FUBU, a brand founded by Daymond John, began with a $100,000 investment and gained significant traction through endorsement by LL Cool J.  FUBU reached $350 million in annual sales by 1998 and now boasts over $6 billion in global sales. The brand's success is attributed to community support and innovation.

articles.title: Hengbot Unveils 'Sirius' at CES 2025, Showcasing New Strengths in the Field of Intelligent Robotics
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Hengbot Innovation Ltd. launched 'Sirius,' a new intelligent robot, at CES 2025 in Las Vegas on January 10, 2025. Sirius, an upgraded version of Sparky, features a stylish design, AI multimodal interaction, and high dynamic motion performance.

articles.title: Hengbot Unveils "Sirius" at CES 2025, Showcasing New Strengths in the Field of Intelligent Robotics
articles.author: Newsfile Corp.
articles.summary: Hengbot Innovation Ltd. debuted its new intelligent robot, 'Sirius,' at CES 2025. Sirius features AI multimodal interaction, a lightweight design under 1 kg, and agile motion control. Hengbot plans to launch a Kickstarter campaign in the first half of 2025 for global crowdfunding of the robot.

articles.title: JuCoin Launchpad: Revolutionizing Crypto Token Launches
articles.author: Vijay A
articles.summary: JuCoin, a centralized exchange, is launching its new Launchpad function. This platform supports emerging crypto projects with token launches, offering tools and resources for planning and execution. Users gain exclusive early access to project tokens before they are available on the open market, with a fair and transparent subscription process.

articles.title: Grownsy Baby Bottle Washer: Simplifying Parent Life
articles.author: PRN
articles.summary: Grownsy has launched its Baby Bottle Washer, an appliance designed to streamline the cleaning of baby bottles and accessories. The washer features four specialized cleaning modes, accommodating four bottles with a universal fit design and eliminating 99.9% of germs using high-pressure spray jets. It is available on the Grownsy website, Amazon, and at select retailers.

articles.title: Shoppers race to Savers to get their hands on a £4.99 product that's just hit the shelves – it's ‘Botox in a bottle'
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: Savers is now selling the new 'Btox Effect serum and cream' by Babaria, priced at £4.99 each. Marketed as 'Botox in a bottle', these products contain a Botox-like tripeptide and are designed to reduce wrinkles and hydrate the skin.

articles.title: Considering a Mitsubishi Outlander? Here are some alternatives
articles.author: Jack Quick
articles.summary: BYD has enhanced the Sealion 6 SUV with extra soundproofing and a comfortable ride. The Sealion 6 aims to offer a premium experience within its price range.

articles.title: OpenAI finalizes O3 Mini reasoning AI model for upcoming launch
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: OpenAI is preparing to launch its new AI model, O3 Mini, in the coming weeks, alongside API and ChatGPT integration. The company has also recently launched a beta feature called Tasks for ChatGPT, entering the virtual assistant market.

articles.title: Nevada's first AI powered car wash opens with music and giveaways
articles.author: News 3 Staff
articles.summary: Scotty's Car Wash launched its first AI-powered, touchless car wash in Southern Nevada. The grand opening event featured live music and giveaways. The car wash utilizes cutting-edge touchless technology to clean vehicles.

articles.title: uWash Washing Powder: Revolutionizing Cleanliness, One Load at a Time
articles.author: SAT Articles
articles.summary: uWash has introduced uWash Washing Powder, a South African product emphasizing quality, sustainability, and ease of use in laundry. It aims to transform laundry into an effortless task using cutting-edge technology. Consumers can find more information at Unit C9, 24 Prop St, Selby South, Johannesburg, or contact them at you@uwash.co.za.

articles.title: Support for Trump's Policies Exceeds Support for Trump - The New York…
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes. The company is collaborating with an agency to create targeted advertising profiles of young parents assumed to be wealthy and have a new child. This will allow them to present advertising within partner apps based on those profiles.

articles.title: Olectra launches Blade Battery Chassis
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Olectra Greentech showcased its new range of electric buses and the Blade Battery Chassis at the Bharat Mobility Global Expo 2025. The showcased products include a redesigned 12-metre Blade Battery Platform, a newly styled 9-metre City bus, and a 12-metre Coach bus. The Blade Battery technology provides 30% more energy storage, enabling the buses to travel up to 500 kilometers on a single charge.

articles.title: ‘Keep warm' says Aldi Ireland as fans rushing to buy €29.99 sleep game-changer in middle aisle
articles.author: Jamie Smith
articles.summary: Aldi Ireland is releasing a heated blanket for €29.99 with nine temperature levels and micro fleece material. Additionally, a Dyson vacuum dupe, the Cyclonic Stick Vacuum Cleaner, is available for €49.99, featuring improved performance and design. Aldi also introduced over 47 new products from 27 Irish suppliers as part of their 'Grow with Aldi' programme.

articles.title: ‘Now the folks across the street can see you put $2 in': Man demands answers after seeing the new gas pumps at Shell
articles.author: Jack Alban
articles.summary: Shell and Exxon Mobil are implementing touchscreen technology in their gas pumps. Shell's new pumps feature a large touchscreen replacing traditional buttons, displaying fuel octanes and costs. Exxon Mobil also has pumps displaying dollar and gallon amounts in a large font.

articles.title: Don't snooze on this sale: DreamCloud mattresses are more than $1,400 off this January
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: DreamCloud is offering up to 50% off best-selling mattresses and 66% off bundles during its Winter Wonders sale, with mattresses starting at $299. Featured products include the DreamCloud Hybrid Mattress, DreamCloud Premier Hybrid Mattress, DreamCloud Premier Rest Hybrid Mattress, DreamCloud Serenity Weighted Blanket, and the DreamCloud Resident Serenity Sleep Bundle, with savings up to $1447.  DreamCloud mattresses come with a 365-night home trial and a lifetime warranty.

articles.title: Don't snooze on this sale: DreamCloud mattresses are more than $1,400 off this January
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: DreamCloud is having a Winter Wonders sale, offering up to 50% off mattresses and 66% off bundles. DreamCloud mattresses come with a 365-night home trial and lifetime warranty. Nectar is also having a New Year mattress sale with up to 50% off.

articles.title: Don't snooze on this sale: DreamCloud mattresses are more than $1,400 off this January
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: DreamCloud is offering up to 50% off best-selling mattresses and 66% off bundles during its Winter Wonders sale. Customers can purchase DreamCloud Hybrid and Premier Hybrid mattresses, along with the Serenity Weighted Blanket and Resident Serenity Sleep Bundle. DreamCloud mattresses come with a lifetime warranty and a 365-night trial period.

articles.title: Don't snooze on this sale: DreamCloud mattresses are more than $1,400 off this January
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: DreamCloud is offering up to 50% off mattresses and 66% off bundles in January, including the DreamCloud Hybrid Mattress Queen and DreamCloud Premier Hybrid Mattress Queen. The sale also includes the DreamCloud Serenity Weighted Blanket and DreamCloud Resident Serenity Sleep Bundle, with a 365-night trial period and a lifetime warranty on mattresses.

articles.title: Don't snooze on this sale: DreamCloud mattresses are more than $1,400 off this January
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: DreamCloud is offering up to 50% off on best-selling mattresses and 66% off on bundles during its Winter Wonders sale. Customers can purchase a DreamCloud mattress for as little as $299 and enjoy a 365-night trial period with a lifetime warranty covering defects.

articles.title: Lidl is selling a £20 gadget that gets rid of condensation instantly and stops you from having wet windows every morning
articles.author: Commissioning Editor
articles.summary: Lidl is selling the Tower Cordless Window Cleaner for £19.99, a gadget designed to remove condensation from windows and other surfaces. The rechargeable device offers 30 minutes of use and is available in-store for a limited time.

articles.title: Lidl is selling a £20 gadget that gets rid of condensation instantly and stops you from having wet windows every morning
articles.author: Martha Cliff
articles.summary: Lidl is selling the Tower Cordless Window Cleaner for £19.99. This gadget removes condensation from windows and can also be used in showers or on tiles. The rechargeable battery offers 30 minutes of use, and the product is available for a limited time in-store.

articles.title: Lidl is selling a £20 gadget that gets rid of condensation instantly and stops you from having wet windows every morning
articles.author: Martha Cliff
articles.summary: Lidl is selling the Tower Cordless Window Cleaner for £19.99. This gadget promises to instantly rid your panes of condensation and 'give your windows a gleaming shine' with its powerful suction that can also be used in showers or on tiles.

articles.title: Nearest Edge Indonesia-{Nearest Edge Login}-The Future of Trading: Exploring Nearest Edge's Innovative Features !
articles.summary: The Nearest Edge platform provides tools for traders with a simple design and strong features. It offers advanced market analysis tools, real-time market data, charting tools, risk management features, and customization options.  The platform supports both technical and fundamental analysis and includes risk management strategies like stop-loss orders, position sizing, and portfolio diversification.

articles.title: Nearest Edge Scam OR Legit-{Nearest Edge Adalah}-Maximize Your Profits with Nearest Edge Apakah Aman's Real-Time Market Insights !
articles.summary: The Nearest Edge trading platform offers advanced tools, real-time data, and risk management features for modern traders. Its key features include advanced trading tools for technical analysis, real-time market data and analytics, customizable interface, predictive analytics and machine learning algorithms, stop-loss orders, position sizing, risk-reward ratios, API access, automated workflow processes, and data visualization tools. The platform aims to improve trading efficiency, provide cost benefits, and increase ROI for professional traders.

articles.title: Nearest Edge Platform-{Nearest Edge App}-How Nearest Edge Simplifies Trading for Beginners and Professionals Alike?
articles.summary: The Nearest Edge trading platform offers real-time market analysis, advanced trading algorithms, and data-driven tools to help traders make informed decisions and maximize profits. It includes features like stop-loss automation, portfolio diversification tools, and customizable alerts, designed to optimize trading strategies and manage risk. The platform aims to provide traders with the necessary tools and insights to achieve their financial goals in cryptocurrency trading.

articles.title: OnePlus Open 2 foldable phone to be launched: Check out the expected date, price, specifications, and more
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: OnePlus is planning to launch its next foldable smartphone, the OnePlus Open 2, in China in February 2025, followed by a global release in late Q1 2025. This phone is expected to feature an 8-inch, 120Hz, 2K LTPO primary display, a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, up to 16GB of RAM and 1TB of storage, and a 5,900mAh battery with 80W wired and 50W wireless charging. The price is expected to be around ₹119,999.

articles.title: well-made flatware in 2025 January 18, 2025 4:04 AM Subscribe
articles.summary: Ikea's Behagfull flatware sets have been positively reviewed for their smooth edges and good quality control, based on experiences with at least four sets.

articles.title: Best Top Load washing machines (January 2025) : 10 Picks For Every Home
articles.summary: LG, Samsung, and Whirlpool are offering new top-load washing machines equipped with the latest technology, high RPM, and multiple wash programs. These machines aim to simplify laundry with user-friendly features, spacious drums, water-saving technology, and additional features like noise reduction.

articles.title: Will Nintendo Get Out of Its Own Way to Make the Switch 2 a Steam Deck Competitor?
articles.author: Oscar Gonzalez
articles.summary: Nintendo is planning to launch the Switch 2, which has the potential to play a wide array of console and PC games through cloud streaming services like Xbox Game Pass and GeForce Now.  The new console could offer backward compatibility with existing Switch games, creating a large game library. This launch aims to dominate not just the console market, but the gaming industry.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2: Features, Release Date, and Backward Compatibility
articles.author: Tech City
articles.summary: Nintendo has unveiled details about the highly anticipated Nintendo Switch 2. The information includes features, the release date, and backward compatibility details for the new console.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 – not all video game sequels are a bad thing
articles.author: Craig Grannell
articles.summary: Nintendo unveiled the Nintendo Switch 2, which appears to be an iteration of the original Nintendo Switch with potential improvements. The new console aims to appeal to the existing user base by offering a familiar experience with enhanced features, while also acknowledging the need for innovation in future iterations. The Nintendo Switch 2 will also support Nintendo Switch 1 digital and physical games.

articles.title: I'll be the Windows 11 guinea pig
articles.author: Rich Warren
articles.summary: Microsoft launched Windows 11, a new operating system that resembles Windows 10 but with a more polished look and more security and customization options. The system requires a Microsoft account and encourages the use of the Microsoft ecosystem, with concerns raised about data tracking for advertising purposes. Despite these concerns, Windows 11 offers acceptable protection with better security features and functions smoothly on PCs and is a free upgrade from Windows 10.

articles.title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 Series: Leaked Prices, Specs, and Launch Details for 2025
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Xiaomi is set to unveil its Redmi Note 14 Series in Indonesia on January 24, 2025. The lineup is speculated to include Redmi Note 14, Redmi Note 14 Pro, and Redmi Note 14 Pro Plus, continuing Xiaomi's tradition of delivering high-performance mid-range smartphones. The Pro+ model stands out with its sleek design, powerful processor, and advanced camera system.

articles.title: VinFast officially enters the Indian market with the launch of the VF 6 and
articles.author: Media Outreach
articles.summary: Galaxy Macau, in partnership with Guojiao 1573, launched the 'Auspicious Snake · Guojiao 1573 Tasting Festival' pop-up store in Macau, showcasing two new baijiu products: 'Guojiao 1573 · Auspicious Spirit Snake' and 'Luzhou Laojiao · 2025 Year of the Yi Si Lunar New Year Gift Baijiu.' Several restaurants at Galaxy Macau and StarWorld Hotel are collaborating to offer limited-time baijiu pairing menus to complement the launch.

articles.title: The 13 Greatest ‘S.N.L.' Commercial Parodies
articles.summary: SNL skits parodied commercials introducing fictional products. 'Shimmer' introduces a floor wax and dessert topping combination, while 'Mom Jeans' showcases pleated jeans. 'Happy Fun Ball' features a toy with absurd warnings, and 'Totino's' humorously portrays a snack catered to football fans. Other product parodies include 'Crystal Gravy' clear gravy, 'Wells for Boys' a well for emotional boys, 'Annuale' feminine health product, 'Hidden Camera Decaf Crystals' decaf coffee, and 'KCF Shredders' a fast food targeted at youth.

articles.title: I made 3 meals for £23 – Yazio changed my food shop
articles.author: Katie Collier
articles.summary: Yazio is a recipe app designed to provide users with meal ideas and structured meal planning. The app organizes recipes into categories such as breakfast, lunch, dinner, vegan, and high protein, offering diverse options. Users can adjust serving sizes, explore international cuisines, and find recipes for special occasions. The Yazio app can be useful for users who want to explore new recipes and track their nutrition.

articles.title: I made 3 meals for under £23 – How an app transformed my weekly food shop
articles.author: Katie Collier
articles.summary: The Yazio app provides recipes split into categories like breakfast, lunch, dinner, vegan, and more, making it easy to find suitable meals. It includes features such as a 'get inspired' section with daily recipe roundups and options to cook with few ingredients or recipes for on-the-go meals. The app also allows users to change serving portions, and tracks nutrition, water intake, carbs, protein, and fat intake.

articles.title: Stop Mopping Your Floors the Old-Fashioned Way — Snag This Shark Steam Mop Instead
articles.author: Toni Sutton
articles.summary: The Shark S1000 Steam Mop is available for $50 at Amazon. This mop eliminates 99.9% of bacteria on sealed floors using only water, heats up in 30 seconds, and features reusable microfiber pads. It is lightweight and easy to maneuver, making floor cleaning faster and more efficient.

articles.title: I just tested the new DJI Flip and it might be the best drone for newbies — here's why
articles.author: Nikita Achanta
articles.summary: DJI launched the DJI Flip drone, a beginner-friendly drone with safety features borrowed from the DJI Neo. The DJI Flip captures 48MP stills and 4K/60fps footage and starts at $439. It features propeller guards, palm takeoff and landing, and can be flown without a controller using the DJI Fly app.

articles.title: https://www.facebook.com/nexagennewzealandofficial/
articles.summary: Nexagen New Zealand, a male enhancement supplement, is introduced as a natural solution to address men's sexual health concerns. It aims to improve libido, stamina, and performance using natural ingredients known for their aphrodisiac and performance-enhancing properties. The supplement supports testosterone production, blood flow, and overall sexual vitality.

articles.title: Mini Cooper S John Cooper Works Pack launched in India at Rs 55.90 lakh
articles.summary: Mini India has launched the new Mini Cooper S John Cooper Works (JCW) Pack, a completely built-up unit (CBU), priced at Rs 55,90,000 ex-showroom. Deliveries are scheduled to begin in April 2025. The car features unique JCW design elements, a 2.0-litre petrol engine producing 204bhp, and advanced safety and connectivity features.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025: How to watch?
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: Samsung will host Galaxy Unpacked 2025 on January 22, 2025, where it is anticipated to unveil the Samsung Galaxy S25 series, which includes the Galaxy S25, S25 Plus, and S25 Ultra. The event will also showcase updates to Galaxy AI and may feature the Samsung Galaxy Ring 2 and Project Moohan, along with the debut of Samsung's One UI 7.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Is a Great Name for Nintendo's New Console, Analysts Say
articles.summary: Analysts suggest 'Nintendo Switch 2' as a suitable name for Nintendo's upcoming console. Other names considered were 'Super Nintendo Switch,' 'Nintendo Switch Pro,' and 'New Nintendo Switch,' before settling on 'Nintendo Switch 2'.

articles.title: Woman goes viral for reviewing Dunkin's avocado toast without tasting it: ‘Forget it'
articles.author: Joseph Lamour
articles.summary: Dunkin' introduced its Avocado Toast in February 2021, later adding bacon in April. A customer review on TikTok of Dunkin's Avocado Toast with Bacon went viral due to the product's hardness. Despite some negative reviews, others have had positive experiences with the item.

articles.title: Amazon scraps popular perk service for Prime members as customers say 'disappointing'
articles.author: Matt LLoyd
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its 'Try Before You Buy' service for Prime members, effective after January 31. This scheme allowed members to sample select clothing, accessories, and footwear before purchase. Amazon cites the limited scalability of the service and increased use of AI-powered features like virtual try-on and personalized size recommendations as reasons for the change.

articles.title: I tried Lush's Bath Bot and had an out-of-body experience
articles.author: Molly Court
articles.summary: Lush has launched the Bath Bot, a water-resistant, dome-shaped device that provides 180-degree sound and synchronized multidirectional lights for an immersive bathing experience. Priced at £150, the Bath Bot, designed by Lush's in-house team and manufactured in the UK, can be controlled via the Lush app and used with Spotify and YouTube. It became available in the UK and Ireland on November 27.

articles.title: New At Nykaa: The Only Event All Beauty Enthusiasts Need To Be At This Month! Tickets are NOW LIVE
articles.summary: Nykaa is launching "New at Nykaa," an exclusive, ticketed event on January 23, 2025, to showcase new beauty product launches from its brands like Nykaa Cosmetics, Kay Beauty, and Moi by Nykaa. The event will provide early access to anticipated product drops and curated experiences, featuring previews of new launches from House of Nykaa brands.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland fans rushing to buy new Dyson vacuum dupes in middle aisle – and they're €250 cheaper
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: ALDI is launching the Cyclonic Stick Vacuum Cleaner, priced at €49.99, in Ireland on January 23. It features cyclonic technology, a lightweight design, and a 650ml dust container. The vacuum is positioned as an affordable alternative to premium models like the Dyson V8.

articles.title: How to tune into Samsung's big Galaxy S25 keynote
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Samsung will host an Unpacked keynote event for the Galaxy S25 series. The event will provide details regarding the new product line.

articles.title: If You Get Excited About Any Of These 20 Target Products, You Might Actually Be An Adult
articles.author: Griffin Gonzales
articles.summary: Target is featuring a variety of new or noteworthy products, including an iced coffee maker, an electric wine bottle opener, and a leopard-print throw blanket. Additionally, Black Girl Sunscreen is promoting its SPF 30, fragrance-free face sunscreen, highlighting its lightweight formula and suitability for daily use.

articles.title: Microsoft Edge 132 Makes It Easier Than Ever to Save Money Online
articles.author: Simon Batt
articles.summary: Microsoft Edge version 132 introduces a new 'Shopping Product Tracking' tool. This feature, accessible from the Edge Address Bar on product detail pages, allows users to track product prices and receive notifications about price drops, enabling them to save money.

articles.title: Doraemon Dorayaki Shop Story Headed to Xbox Series X
articles.author: William D'Angelo
articles.summary: Kairosoft is launching Doraemon Dorayaki Shop Story on Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One on January 16. This management simulation game allows players to run a sweets shop with Doraemon, create dorayaki, and manage the store to attract customers.

articles.title: Unrivaled Poco X7 (Pro) Breaks Records – Only 5,490 CZK Until Sunday
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Poco launched the Poco X7 Pro smartphone, emphasizing premium features at an accessible price. The launch includes a special price of 7,990 CZK available until January 19, along with exclusive perks like discounts, extended warranty, and interest-free payments through Mobil Emergency Services. The Poco X7 Pro features a high-refresh-rate AMOLED display, a versatile camera system with a 108MP primary sensor, and a powerful Snapdragon processor.

articles.title: I finally tried the Android tablet made for seniors, and I'm impressed
articles.author: Jason Howell
articles.summary: GrandPad has introduced an 8-inch Android tablet designed specifically for seniors with features like large, easy-to-read icons, simplified navigation, video call support, multiplayer games, and private photo sharing. The tablet aims to keep seniors connected and promote independence with technology.

articles.title: How Are Coronado Businesses Using AI to Stay Profitable?
articles.author: Promoted Partner
articles.summary: Coronado businesses are integrating AI to enhance their services. Restaurants are experimenting with AI-driven customer service tools, while boutiques are using AI video generators for marketing. Cafes are using AI-driven analytics to optimize their menus. These AI implementations aim to personalize customer experiences and improve business operations.

articles.title: Cracking the Code on AI's Next Major Frontier: Spatial and Physics-Based Intelligence in Commerce
articles.summary: Mode Maison Labs introduces the àlaMode foundation model, a spatially aware and physically-based AI system for generative commerce, along with TMAC (Total Material Appearance Capture) technology. This aims to provide immersive digital experiences for consumers by creating realistic product simulations. Brands can use àlaMode to generate and integrate physically-based real-world products into spatially and contextually-aware worlds, offering immersive experiences that reduce uncertainty, build trust, and drive transaction rates.

articles.title: Galaxy Macau Collaborates with 'Luzhou Laojiao · Guojiao 1573" Spring Festival Tasting Pop-Up Store Debuts
articles.summary: Galaxy Macau, in partnership with Guojiao 1573, launched two new Baijiu products: 'Guojiao 1573 · Auspicious Spirit Snake' and 'Luzhou Laojiao · 2025 Year of the Yi Si Lunar New Year Gift Baijiu'. These products debuted at a pop-up store in Macau and are featured in baijiu pairing menus at select Galaxy Macau and StarWorld Hotel restaurants. The 'Guojiao 1573 · Auspicious Spirit Snake' is a limited edition of 2025 bottles.

articles.title: Book review: Tayto's history more than a matter of taste
articles.author: Brendan Daly
articles.summary: Tayto launched a sour cream and Dunne'ion flavor to celebrate Richard Dunne. Initially, Tayto offered plain, cheese, and cheese and onion varieties. The company also introduced a limited-edition Tayto milk chocolate bar with cheese and onion crisps.

articles.title: Brutal reaction to Nintendo's new console
articles.author: Ben Graham
articles.summary: Nintendo has revealed its new console, the Switch 2, which is broadly similar in appearance to the original hybrid Switch. The console is expected to be on sale sometime in 2025. A new version of the long-running Mario Kart series will be available on the new console.

articles.title: Progresso launches Soup Drops, a hard candy that's 'soup you can suck on'
articles.author: Terry Dickerson
articles.summary: Progresso has launched a new product, "soup you can suck on," a savory lozenge designed to replicate the taste of their Traditional Chicken Noodle Soup. The product is packaged in a can resembling Progresso's soup cans and contains 20 individually wrapped candies with flavors of broth, chicken, vegetables, soft egg noodles, and a hint of spice.

articles.title: Cheap alternative to WHMCS
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: domainCart is introduced as a PHP script alternative to WHMCS for domain and web hosting ordering. It offers features such as an AJAX domain checker with WHOIS lookup and a unified page for adding domains and hosting to the shopping cart. The script is designed to sell domain names and can be enabled to offer hosting packages.

articles.title: Worth the wait?
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Hyundai launched the Kona, a mid-sized electric SUV, six years ago, which received positive feedback. Following this, Hyundai introduced the IONIQ 5, further solidifying their position in the electric vehicle market.

articles.title: Azercell Launches A New Guest Login Feature In Its App
articles.author: MENA FN
articles.summary: Azercell has introduced the 'Guest Login' feature in its mobile application. This feature aims to provide a more seamless and user-centric service experience.

articles.title: Golf News January 18, 2025
articles.author: Golf Blogger
articles.summary: Samsung is rumored to be unveiling the Galaxy Z Fold 6 with a thinner design and improved camera. LG is expected to introduce the 'LG Crystal Canvas,' a transparent OLED TV. Sony will announce the WH-1000XM6 noise-canceling headphones, boasting enhanced audio quality and battery life.

articles.title: New Netflix film dubbed 'bizarre and incredible' leaves fans 'genuinely baffled'
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Netflix is encouraging viewers to experience its 'genius' feature. The specifics of this feature are not detailed but it implies enhancement of user experience on the platform.

articles.title: Mazda to launch four new cars in Mzansi
articles.author: Sowetan Live
articles.summary: Mazda is introducing new models. These models are expected to re-ignite something.
